consultationDescription: We are working on a project for a client who is looking at $PROJECT. In connection with this, our client is trying to gain a better understanding of
screeningQuestion1: Years of experience do you have

feeAssociatedToInvoiceEditableMessage: The fee has been associated with an invoice, however, it can still be edited temporarily. Please note that once this invoice has been moved out of a draft status by finance, fees attached to it will no longer be editable.
feeAssociatedToInvoiceMessage: The fee has been associated with the invoice, hence cannot be edited anymore. Please consult with finance department about further action.
feeAssociatedToENSInvoiceMessage: This fee has been associated with an ENS invoice.
feeAssociatedToENSCallOnlyInvoiceMessage: This fee has been associated with an ENS call only invoice.
feeLOPProjectTypeMessage: This is a LOP project type and free call (e.g. marketing/discount/proposal)
mckinseyChinaInvoiceComment: Shanghai invoice booked to US per 2021 extension, service provided outside United States
mckinseyNoInvoiceEntityMessage: This project does not have an Invoicing Entity. No automated invoices will be created for this project.
mckinseyProjectLocationMissingMessage: Project Location Missing from McKinsey. An email notification has been sent to ENS
